column1: Little Goat Diner////with all they hype around this place
column2: I thought the food would have been better. Our bloody Mary's were too spicy ( and I like spicy) where I had to clear my throat and drink water between sips and too thick. I got "This little piggy went to China" and it was just too salty
column3: the cheddar biscuit is mostly what I ate off that dish. My boyfriend ordered the "KIMCHEE & BACON & EGGS & PANCAKES ASIAN STYLE BREAKFAST TASTY THING" and again
column4: too salty. We didn't finish our meals or drinks. Maybe it was just the items we ordered
column5: but pretty disappointed to pay over $50 for a breakfast that we didn't enjoy.
